>
> When I see =
1001 tests failed, I know I should be
> looking at the forest.  When I see =
1 test failed I know I should look at

Very poetic, but still =
doesn't make a whole lot of sense to me :-)

You just said it yourself:  wh=
en you see 1001 tests failed, you know it's
actually only 1 test that faile=
d  and it took down the other 1000.

Wouldn't it be nice if the framework t=
old you exactly *which* test failed
instead of you having to pin down which=
 test starts the Web server or which
tests opens a JDBC connection among th=
ousands?
